fields.name: Sainsbury's Pinot Grigio Taste the Difference 75cl
fields.description: Elegant and dry, this Pinot Grigio is characterised by flavours of peaches, greengages and almonds.

fields.name: Brancott Estate Flight Sauvignon Blanc 75cl
fields.description: With fragrant passion fruit, lemons and grapefruit aromas on the nose. These aromas are followed by a sweet pungency and ripe lemon sherbet flavors that change to mangos. The palate shows great balance with a refreshing, crisp and lively acidity. A stunning, vibrant and refreshing low alcohol wine. Naturally 20% lower in alcohol and calories.

fields.name: Hardys Varietal Chardonnay 75cl
fields.description: A lively Chadonnay full of rich melon and peach flavours with a crisp finish - great with Thai fish cakes or chicken Caesar salad.

fields.name: Coolwater Bay Marlborough Sauvignon 75cl
fields.description: An elegant wine with delicate aromas of fresh herbs, citrus and stone fruits and flavours of zesty lemon and lime combined with a distinctive mineral note and a fresh finish.

fields.name: Sainsbury's House Merlot 75cl
fields.description: If you love easy-drinking, ultra smooth reds then this wine is for you. It is bursting with juicy plum and forest fruit flavours.

fields.name: Carta Roja Gran Reserva 75cl
fields.description: Carta Roja is made traditionally from Monastrell grapes which produce rich and intense wines. This Grand Reservada is full-bodied with red fruit aromas and intense flavours of ripe plum and vanilla. Aged in vat, American oak barrels and matured in bottle, this wine has soft, smooth tannins.

fields.name: Brancott Estate Hawkes Bay Merlot Red Wine 75cl
fields.description: Dark berries and cocoa flavours create a smooth, mellow wine.

fields.name: Yellow Tail Shiraz 75cl
fields.description: This yellow tail Shiraz is everything a great wine should be - vibrant, smooth, rich and easy to drink.
